an3.50:4.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an3.50:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca hoti, balavanissito ca hoti.
an3.50:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro nadīviduggaṃ vā nissito hoti pabbatavisamaṃ vā.
an3.50:4.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro tiṇagahanaṃ vā nissito hoti, rukkhagahanaṃ vā rodhaṃ vā mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ vā.
an3.50:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ vā nissito hoti.
an3.50:6.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an3.50:6.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tyāssa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
an3.50:6.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:6.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an3.50:7.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
an3.50:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti gahananissito ca balavanissito ca.
an3.50:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamena kāyakammena samannāgato hoti, visamena vacīkammena samannāgato hoti, visamena manokammena samannāgato hoti.
an3.50:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti.
an3.50:9.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ vā nissito hoti.
an3.50:10.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an3.50:10.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tyāssa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
an3.50:10.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:10.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti.
an3.50:13.4: mahācorenekādasāti.
